item.title: Y-3 Launches Y-3 Sport
item.description:
Y-3 Launches Y-3 Sport

Though Y-3 is a beautiful collaboration between avant-garde Japanese designer Yohji Yamamoto and global sportswear brand adidas, surprisingly, it's always been a fashion-first line. After 15 years, Yamamoto has thought it the proper time to go deep into Y-3's DNA and design its first-ever fully functional sport line.

item.title: Cuba on the Edge of Change
item.description:
Cuba on the Edge of Change

at times can feel like a nation abandoned. The aching disrepair of its cities, the untamed foliage of its countryside, the orphaned coastlines - a half-century of isolation has wrapped the country in decay. Yet few places in the world brim with as much life as Cuba, a contrast drawn sharper amid its faded grandeur.
